short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplifies the creation of background,user-friendly interface,customizable patterns,adjustable parameters,instant previews.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension designed to help designers quickly check and visualize the background of HTML elements using their element IDs and color codes. This type of tool can be valuable for web designers and developers to streamline their workflow.
